sourcesContent:
import React, { useContext } from 'react' import AddToCartButton from '../AddToCartButton' import BookmarkButton from '../BookmarkButton' import { Col } from 'react-bootstrap' import Row from 'react-bootstrap/Row' import Card from 'react-bootstrap/Card' import useProductDetail from './product-detail.hooks' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faWineBottle } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' import Spinner from 'react-bootstrap/Spinner' import MessageModal from '../MessageModal' import ModalContext from '../compability/modal.context' const ProductDetailCard = () => { const { productDetail, loading, error, errorMessage, visibleModalError, handleCloseError } = useProductDetail() const { productName, handleClickCart, handleClickBookmark, visibleModal, visibleModalBookmark, handleClose, handleCloseBookmark } = useContext(ModalContext) const quantity = () => { if (productDetail.qty <= 5 && productDetail.qty > 0) { return <>
{`${productDetail.qty} BOTTLES LEFT`}
} else if (productDetail.qty === 0) { return <>
OUT OF STOCK
} else return '' } return (
{productDetail.name}
{productDetail.grapeVarieties}, {productDetail.vintageYear === 0 ? '' : productDetail.vintageYear}
{ quantity() }
S$ {productDetail.price}
handleClickCart(productDetail.name, e)} textSize="12px"/> handleClickBookmark(productDetail.name, e)}/>
Region
{productDetail.country}, {productDetail.region}
Producer
{productDetail.producer}
Bottle
{productDetail.bottleSize}ml
Alcohol
{productDetail.alcohol}%
Description
{productDetail.description}
Tasting Notes
{productDetail.tastingNotes}
 { loading && } { error && } ) } export default ProductDetailCard
